text: Martin Červeňák (born 11 January 1999) is a Slovak footballer who currently plays for FK Senica as a defender. ==Club career== ===FK Senica=== Červeňák made his professional Fortuna Liga's debut for FK Senica on 1 October 2016 against Spartak Myjava.SPARTAK MYJAVA VS. SENICA 2 - 0 01.10.2016, soccerway.com ==References== ==External links== * FK Senica profile * * Futbalnet profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Senica players Category:Slovak Super Liga players
title: Martin Červeňák
